attributes.action: Prime minister Johnston and chancellor Sunak too resign NOW!
attributes.additional_details: Total disgrace you make the rules that people followed even though they had loved ones dying that they could not even visit in hospital whilst on their death beds whilst you lot in Westminster had numerous parties gathering in groups with no social distancing or even a face mask in sight. The population are now at the hands of people who can’t even abide by the LAWS they set and expect the rest of us to follow them then fine people up to 10k for a gathering. Disgraceful. This government is a shambles

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
